lines.text:
[on the phone with Lindsey]
Sir Anthony Gelding wants to know how much you would ask to appear here in our floor show at the Happy Hour... How much? How much? My dear young lady, it's only for singing. Sir Anthony Gelding's a happily married man.
[Bellairs has chastised the maitre d' for letting a fast crowd into the club]
They all come from good families, sir.
Ambrose Bierce said, "A sweetheart is like a bottle of wine, a wife is like a wine bottle."
